title: how to...
body:
GET OUT OF s4
everytime i get somewhere high in s4 (92 lp) i get teammates that are either bots or its their first ranked games. seriously. this is ridiculous. this is actually pathetic how crap the systems are. they say they match u with people in ur skill bracket, but i find it VERY hard to believe that. had 2 games b4 with 2 people that said nothing all game and proceded to be a bot. go to the same lane. die. and repeat. miss cs. hav 100 cs at 20 mins and 10 deaths. not know how to ping. can u seriously fix this or hav a mode like teambuilder for ranked which asks u
DO U WANT TO PLAY SERIOUSLY OR NOT
click yes u play seriously or penalties apply.
have first time ranked people in their own ranked until placed in a league
i am so tired of having meatheads on my team who blame me (the jungler) for every little problem they have. i sick to death of idiots that troll after first blood or just feed the most OP person on their team. y cant other teams get these idiot people instead of me 4 ONE GAME. JUST 1. then maybe i could find something to look forward to instead of the meatheads that will feed and troll like always.
upvote and downvote me. idc. i just find it so hard to believe that people can actually get away with this crap and believe me they do. only person that reports them for intentionally feeding or not communicating is me. and 1 report goes NOWHERE.
FIX THIS CRAP SYSTEM U HAVE FOR MATCHMAKING. I DONT WANT FIRST TIME RANKED PEOPLE AND I WANT PEOPLE THAT COMMUNICATE WITH THEIR TEAM

replies.body: and again another person complaining that their team is holding them down instead of trying to improve upon their own play, classic, and 100c cs by 20 minutes is normal for bronze games.

> [{quoted}](name=Wumachine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RqMAvTId,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-28T10:50:16.243+0000)
>
> and again another person complaining that their team is holding them down instead of trying to improve upon their own play, classic, and 100c cs by 20 minutes is normal for bronze games.

This. 
What people fail to understand is that everyone is in the same boat, we all get the trolls, the AFK's, the feeders and the bads. Everyone, not just the guys that complain about "I can't climb because I always get stuck with four other feeders" has to deal with em.

so if everyone gets "trolls, the AFK's, the feeders and the bads" then that means EVERYONE is a troll, afk, feeder and bad, saying that you are perfect and that you never make mistakes and only blaming team mates for your losses is what is holding you down

"I can't climb because I always get stuck with four other feeders" = bronze mentality

you talk as if you've never fed before or you've never had a bad game, please.

100 cs @ 20 mins is impressive for a Silver player, especially when they've died 10 times.

Contrary to popular belief, this doesn't just happen in very low Elo. Every person from every Elo sometimes gets team mates/opponents who act like they play without a mouse or keyboard.

Getting 100 cs by 20 min and 10 deaths in ranked would be a insanely good bot. The fact is they probably just kinda suck or are just having a bad game. I think match making is fine.

If you don't believe me think about this, since you are supposedly not a feeder, there is only 44% chance of a feeder being on your team. But the enemy team has a 56% chance of having this feeder.

and it happened again today. YAY. SO HAPPY
2-16 lb
0-10 nidalee
can i GET A BREAK
I JUST WANT 1 GOOD GAME
1. THATS ALL I ASK. SICK OF THIS CRAP
